iti50:1.1: This was said by the Buddha, the Perfected One: that is what I heard.
iti50:2.1: “Mendicants, there are these three unskillful roots.
iti50:2.4: These are the three unskillful roots.”
iti50:3.3: they harm a person of wicked heart,
iti50:3.4: as a reed is destroyed by its own fruit.”
iti50:4.1: This too is a matter that was spoken by the Blessed One: that is what I heard.
